thread.title: Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta Offers Close Lodging for Eastman Gun Show
thread.title_full: Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta Offers Close Lodging for Eastman Gun Show - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta Offers Close Lodging for Eastman Gun Show
text:
The Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta offers close lodging for the Eastman Gun Show on October 17-18, 2015.
 ATLANTA, GA, October 06, The Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta hotel offers close and convenient lodging for the Eastman Gun Show on October 17-18. The show will be held at the North Atlanta Trade Center in Norcross, Georgia. Dealers will have thousands of new and used firearms for sale including handguns, rifles, shotguns, and ammunition. Buyers will also find gun cases, knives, and hunting accessories. Show admission is $10 for adults. Children under age 12 are admitted free.
"We are happy to welcome guests attending the Eastman Gun Show," notes Samuel Head, the new General Manager at the Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta. "Our Doraville Georgia hotel is located just ten minutes from the North Atlanta Trade Center," explains Head.
Travelers will find comfortable guest rooms at the Clarion Hotel & Conference Center. Complimentary high speed Internet access is available in every room. Some rooms feature a microwave, refrigerator, and sleeper sofa. Amenities at this property include a business center, meeting space, exercise room, and seasonal outdoor pool. Clarion's new restaurant, Perimeter Bar & Grille, is now open. As a guest convenience, the hotel provides free weekday shuttle service within a three mile radius including the Doraville MARTA Station.
This pet friendly Doraville hotel is located near the intersection of I-85 and I-285 on Atlanta's north side. Choice Privileges members will earn points toward free nights. AAA, senior, and military rates are available.
For more information about Eastman Gun Shows, visit www.eastmangunshows.com . To book your stay at the Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta, call 770-455-3700 or visit online at www.northatlantahotel.com .
About Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta
The newly opened Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta is located just off I-285 at Exit 32 near Doraville and is conveniently located 14 miles from downtown Atlanta. This north Atlanta hotel was built with features and amenities to ensure you'll truly have a great stay with us including complimentary Wi-Fi, meeting and convention space, seasonal outdoor pool and pet-friendly lodging. Guests will enjoy their stay at Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta by Choice Hotels. The property participates in the Choice Privileges rewards program.
For more information visit www.northatlantahotel.com
For all media inquiries, please contact:
Allison Reinert
Cardinal Web Solutions
